    • Method Detail

      • createPacket

        public static byte[] createPacket(byte socketMode,
                  byte userMode,
                  int topic,
                  byte[] data)
        Creates a packet to send it.
        Parameters:
        socketMode - The mode the packet will be sent through.
        userMode - The user mode.
        topic - The topic the packet belongs to.
        data - The data itself of the message.
        Returns:
        Byte array of the created packet to send.

      • isPacketValid

        private static boolean isPacketValid(byte[] packet)
        Method that determines if a packet is valid.
        Parameters:
        packet - The packet to check if is valid.
        Returns:
        true if the packet is valid; false if it is not.

      • getSocketMode

        public static byte getSocketMode(byte[] packet)
                          throws InvalidPacketException
        Retrieves the socket mode defined in the packet.
        Parameters:
        packet - The constructed packet.
        Returns:
        The socket mode defined in the packet.
        Throws:
        InvalidPacketException - If the given packet is invalid.

        Returns:

        Throws:
